name: Crown Combat
description:
A virtual board game based on chess, Crown Combat has different and unique pieces. In the multiplayer mode, you and a friend take turns placing pieces, which costs you points. After spending it all up or filling the board, you can then play against your friend. The goal of this game is to capture the king, not checkmate.

In the puzzle mode, there are preset positions. As the level number gets higher, the puzzle gets more difficult. 

As this game is in alpha, there will be many bugs. If bugs occur, you might just have to reload the page.

Credits

  • Background Music: “Medieval Town” by Syncopika under CC BY 3.0. Link: opengameart.org/content/medieval-town
  • Background: "Handpainted Stone Wall Textures" by PamNawi under CC BY 4.0. Saturation was decreased.
  • Pieces from game-icons.net. Colors were changed and outlines were added to some copies.
    • King: "Imperial crown icon" by Delapouite under CC BY 3.0
    • Peasant: "Cowled icon" by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
    • Berserker: "Warlord helmet icon" by Caro Asercion under CC BY 3.0
    • Paladin: "Barbute icon" by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
    • Bomber: "Unlit bomb icon" by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
    • Assassin: "Hood icon" by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
    • Bowman: "Crossbow icon" by Carl Olsen under CC BY 3.0
    • Crowns on start screen: "Crown icon" by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
